name: treatment of waste reinforced concrete, collection for final disposal | waste reinforced concrete | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15082/documentation

The waste contains 0.97kg inert material (GSD=100.1%) and 0.03kg steel (GSD=107.9%).  Waste density is 2300 kg/m3. 

energy for dismantling, particulate matter emissions from dismantling and handling, transport to dismantling facilities, final disposal of waste material,
